basics.name: Joshua Samonte
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Engineering at the University of Hawaii at Mānoa. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2025.

work.summary: Undergraduate Student Ambassador for the College of Engineering at UH Mānoa
highlights: Plan and create events for the University of Hawaii College of Engineering
Outreach to various locations/high schools to share about our experiences as engineering students
Help to facilitate programs for current and possible future engineering students
Assist hotel guests with pool needs
Sales transactions (rentals: cabanas, surfboards, lessons, etc.)
Assists hardware teams with debugging of software issues
Updates production code for storage infrastructure
Upkeeps version control through Git and Github
Started as a pledge in August 2023: Participated in community service events, tutoring fellow undergraduate engineering students, and help to host fundraisers
Currently will be planning the Induction Ceremony for this years pledges, managing Blueprints, planning Holmescoming event, assisting the President and club

awards.title: Provost Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who are "recognized high-achieving students that demonstrate that they will make a positive impact on the UH Mānoa community." These students must maintain a 3.0 GPA every semester and remain a full-time student at Mānoa

awards.title: Dean's List
awards.summary: Award given to full-time students that earn a 3.5 semester GPA or higher. Missed Fall 2023 semester.
